actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A concurrent resolution honoring the centennial celebration of the University of Kansas basketball program and the contributions of the program to the sport of basketball and of the coaches, players, and 500 lettermen, who have achieved success and made significant contributions on and off the basketball court.

summary.text: Honors the 100 years of basketball history at the University of Kansas and the players, coaches, alumni, and fans of the Jayhawks who have participated in the basketball program throughout the years.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution honoring the centennial celebration of the University of Kansas basketball program and the contributions of the program to the sport of basketball and of the coaches, players, and 500 lettermen, who have achieved success and made significant contributions on and off the basketball court.
